snippet: PERLMAN--Lucille, died at home on January 15, 2016 at the age of 101. Beloved mother of Bill (Patricia) and the late Lee. Grandmother of Deirdre, Michelle and Phillipe. Great-grandmother of Erin and Max. Loving wife of the late Samuel. Donations in her name may be made to The Central Park Conservancy. 1/3
lead_paragraph: PERLMAN--Lucille, died at home on January 15, 2016 at the age of 101. Beloved mother of Bill (Patricia) and the late Lee. Grandmother of Deirdre, Michelle and Phillipe. Great-grandmother of Erin and Max. Loving wife of the late Samuel. Donations in her name may be made to The Central Park Conservancy. 1/3
